mapper.select: select sum(od.shoppingnum) shoppingnum, g.id ,gname ,goprice ,grprice ,gstore ,gpicture ,description from tb_goods g,tb_orderdetail od where g.id = od.goodstable_id group by g.id order by shoppingnum desc limit 6
select count(g.id) focusNum,g.id,gname,grprice,g.gpicture,description from tb_goods g,tb_focus f where g.id = f.goodstable_id group by g.id order by focusNum desc limit 24

select g.*,typename from tb_goods g,tb_goodstype t
g.gtype_id = t.id
and t.id = #{goodstype_id}
order by g.id desc limit 6
select * from tb_notice order by ntime desc

select g.*,typename from tb_goods g,tb_goodstype t
g.gtype_id = t.id and g.gname like CONCAT('%',#{mykey},'%')
select goods.*,typename from tb_goods goods ,tb_goodstype goodstype where goods.id = #{id} and goods.gtype_id = goodstype.id
